title: ICT-Integrated Language Curriculum Innovation: Strengthening Secondary Administrator Capabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience in using digital tools
context.additional_context: Course focused on strengthening ICT-based language curriculum design and operational competencies for secondary education administrators/leaders in corporate settings. Emphasizes collaboration tool utilization in BYOD environments and digital literacy enhancement

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more frameworks for designing language curricula utilizing ICT tools.
Learners can design at least one blended language instruction model incorporating digital resources.
Learners can implement two or more ICT-based assessment strategies to promote learner engagement in BYOD environments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
